knimeNode.name: Compute Surface of WKT geometries
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compute the surface of the geometry (m2)

fullDescription.intro:
Compute the surface of WKT geometries in square meters. Stores the result in a novel column of type Double.
In order to compute the size of the area in square meters, the node first reprojects the original parameters into a flat cartesian plane. This might lead to errors in case your initial Coordinate Reference System is not an ESPG standard one. If you get errors related to Bursa Wolf parameters or similar errors due to projection, please try to use the "Reproject WKT geometries" in order to first reproject your geometries into a welldefined CRS.
fullDescription.option: Name of the column which will be created with the surface of each geometry

ports.outPort: The table with an additional column containing the surface
